statements: DELETE FROM IndoorAirQualityData WHERE sensor_id = 'abc123' AND timestamp > '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM IndoorAirQualityData WHERE location_id = 'xyz789' AND humidity < 50;
DELETE FROM BuildingOccupants WHERE age < 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM BuildingOccupants WHERE age > 50 AND gender = 'Female';
DELETE FROM AirQualityData WHERE CO2_level > 800 AND temperature < 20;
DELETE FROM BuildingInfo WHERE location = 'New York' OR floor_count > 5;
DELETE FROM BuildingOccupants WHERE building_id = 1 AND occupant_id = 1;
DELETE FROM building_info WHERE building_type = 'Office Building' AND construction_year < 2000;
